Class FragmentJoining

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.grammar.AbstractRule
      opennlp.ccg.grammar.FragmentJoining
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Rule
public class FragmentJoining
extends AbstractRule

Rule for joining fragments that don't fit together, when all else fails.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $, $Date: 2009/07/17 04:23:30 $
